testcase.name: Login without credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and click URL............................................passed When Login without username and password....................................passed Then Verify not able to login with error message............................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Continue shopping button in cart
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and click URL............................................passed And Login with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"...........................passed And Add product to cart.....................................................passed And Go to cart..............................................................passed When Click Continue shopping button in cart.................................passed Then Verify the page is inventory page......................................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Logout to the app
testcase.system-out: Given Open Browser and click URL............................................passed And User Login with credentials.............................................passed When Logout to the application..............................................passed Then Verify that user is in logout page.....................................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
